lines.content: * Exceptions for errors specific to this package.
* Creates a new DukeException with a given message.
* @param message The message for the exception.
* @return A string with "☹ OOPS!!! " followed by the error message.
* Class that contains methods to help with parsing user commands.
* Parses a given command and prints the appropriate responses.
* @param ui The ui to use for displaying the responses.
* @param taskList A list of existing tasks.
* @return true if the command is to exit, false otherwise.
static boolean parse(String command, Ui ui, TaskList taskList) {
throw new DukeException("The description of a todo cannot be empty.");
throw new DukeException("The description of a deadline cannot be empty.");
throw new DukeException("A deadline must contain a /by");
throw new DukeException("The description of an event cannot be empty.");
throw new DukeException("An event must contain an /at");
throw new DukeException("I'm sorry, but I don't know what that means :-(");
* The main class for the Piggy application.
* Creates a new Piggy application that reads and writes to a file
* @param filePath The path of the data file.
* @param args List of arguments to be passed to the application.
* Class that handles storing and retrieving task data from the disk.
* Creates a new Storage object for the given file path.
* @param path The path to the file to read/write to (does not have to exist)
* Returns a list of tasks read from the data file.
* Writes the tasks to the disk inside the data file. Overrides any existing
* @param tasks The TaskList to write to disk.
* Creates a new TaskList from a List of Tasks.
* @param index The 0-based index of the task to remove.
* Returns the task at the given index
* @param index The index to get the task from.
* Returns an Iterator over the tasks.
* Returns a List of the Tasks.
* Returns a list of tasks whose description contains the keyword.
* @return The list of tasks that match.
* Creates a new UI object. Uses STDIN for input and STDOUT for output.
* Shows the welcome message on the output.
System.out.println("What can I oink for you?");
System.out.println("Use the following format for datetime: yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm");
* Shows the bye message on the output and stops receiving user input.
System.out.println("Bye. Hope to oink you again soon!");
* Shows the list of tasks on the output.
* @param tasks The list of tasks to show.
System.out.println("Here are the tasks in your list:");
* Show that a task has been added along with the remaining tasks.
* @param task             The added task to show.
* @param noRemainingTasks The number of remaining tasks.
System.out.println("Got it. I've added this task:");
System.out.println("Now you have " + noRemainingTasks + " tasks in the list.");
* Show that a task has been removed along with the remaining tasks.
* @param task             The removed task to show.
* @param noRemainingTasks The number of remaining tasks.
System.out.println("Now you have " + noRemainingTasks + " tasks in the list.");
* Show that a task has been marked as done.
* @param task The task that has been marked as done.
System.out.println("Nice! I've marked this task as done:");
* Show that a task has been marked as not done.
* @param task The task that has been marked as not done.
System.out.println("OK, I've marked this task as not done yet:");
* Show the list of tasks found.
System.out.println("No matching tasks found in your list.");
System.out.println("Here are the matching tasks in your list:");
* Shows a DukeException on the output.
* Reads a command from the input.
* A Task made for deadlines that can store a deadline.
* Creates a new Deadline with the given description and deadline.
* The Deadline is marked as not done by default.
* @param description The description of the deadline task.
* @param by The due date of the deadline.
* Returns a String representation of the Deadline.
* @return A String of the format "[D][<X or ' '>] <description> (by: <deadline>)".
* A Task made for events that can store the event's date.
* Creates a new Event with the given description and datetime.
* The Event is marked as not done by default.
* @param description The description of the event.
* @param by The datetime of the event.
* Returns a String representation of the Event.
* @return A String of the format "[E][<X or ' '>] <description> (at: <datetime>)".
* Contains information for a task and allows for marking whether it is done.
* Creates a new Task with the given description.
* The task is marked as not done by default.
* @param description The description of the task.
* Returns a status icon based on whether the task is done.
* @return The {@link String} "X" if done, and " " otherwise.
return (isDone ? "X" : " "); // mark done task with X
* Marks the Task as not done.
* Returns the description of the Task.
* Sets the current description of the Task
* @param description The new description to be set.
* Returns whether the Task is done.
* @return true if done, and false otherwise
* Returns a String representation of the Task.
* @return A String of the format "[<X or ' '>] <description>"
* A Task that also stores an associated DateTime.
/** The DateTimeFormatter used for input into this class */
public static final DateTimeFormatter inDateTimeFormatter = DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm");
/** The DateTimeFormatter used for output from this class */
public static final DateTimeFormatter outDateTimeFormatter = DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("MMM dd yyyy HH:mm");
* Creates a new TaskWithDate with the given description and datetime.
* @param description The description of the task.
* @param datetime A datetime with format "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm".
* Returns the formatted datetime of this task.
* @return The datetime with format "MMM dd yyyy HH:mm".
* Returns a LocalDateTime object from this task's datetime.
* A Task specifically made for Todos,
* Creates a new Todo with the given description.
* The Todo is marked as not done by default.
* @param description The description of the todo.
* Returns a String representation of the Todo.
* @return A String of the format "[T][<X or ' '>] <description>"
